de.mrapp.android.dialog.adapter

Class RecyclerViewAdapterWrapper.NoChoiceMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.dialog.adapter.RecyclerViewAdapterWrapper.NoChoiceMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecyclerViewAdapterWrapper.ChoiceMode
    Enclosing class:
    RecyclerViewAdapterWrapper<VH extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder>

    public static class RecyclerViewAdapterWrapper.NoChoiceMode
extends java.lang.Object
implements RecyclerViewAdapterWrapper.ChoiceMode
    A choice mode, which allows no list items to be selected at all.
